CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 10, reads: "Recital - Joseph W. Grider, head of the music department at West Virginia State College, was presented in recital last Sunday, April 25, by Marie Carter Hayes in a magnificent concert which ended the musical season in Pittsburgh...In the bottom photo the artist is seen surrounded by the lovely aides, including Mmes. Elizabeth Youngue, Earsley Kincaid, Bernice Wade, Lula Howell, Catherine Maddox, Marie Mellon, Margaret Lewis and Marion Holmes. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Eight women wearing gowns, Elizabeth Youngue, Earsley Kincaid, Bernice Wade, Lula Howell, Catherine Maddox, Marie Mellon, Margaret Lewis and Marion Holmes, surrounding Joseph W. Grider playing piano, for recital in Hayes School of Music, 6490 Frankstown Avenue, East Liberty
